L Big Repair Job is Started on Hirneji Castle.
Ln eight year; 540 million yen repair job on famous Hirneji
Castle is to get underway this summer late. Since the whole
structure is deteriorating, it was decided to dismantle
and completely repair the castle long since named a National
Treasure. Because of its white walls, Hirneji Castle has
been likened to a snowy heron and is commonly called the
Snowy Heron Castle. Considered the most beautiful in Japan,
the castle was built 3f0 year a e£,c5 and is a superb example
of native Japanese feudal architecture.

Tokyo’s Ceramics show again proves the high artistic skill
CL the Japanese.
There are many types rf ceramics made in Japan, each differing
according to the kiln at which it is made, and the traditions
which each represents.
Lrnong those popular for refined taste and practical use,
the Kiyomizu wares of Kyoto rank high. One of the main
characteristics of the orthodox : Kiyomizu wares is its
so-called ’’soma-isuke’' of under-glaze blue and white.
These wares with smooth textured glaze are very pleasant
both to sight and touch.
